Jeremiah or Jeremias__50.2__Bel: : Bel and Merodach were worshipped for gods by the men of Babylon.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__50.16__The dove: : Or the destroyer; for the Hebrew word signifies either the one or the other.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__50.39__Fig fauns: : Monsters of the desert, or demons in monstrous shapes: such as the ancients called fauns and satyrs; and as they imagined them to live upon wild figs, they called them fauni ficarii or fig fauns.
